summary: A class that models a D‑Link smart plug, providing methods to retrieve its power usage, expose its state attributes, report its on/off status and name, and to control the plug by turning it on or off while keeping its data refreshed.
business_intent: Allow home‑automation platforms to remotely manage and monitor D‑Link smart plugs, enabling users to automate power control, track energy consumption, and integrate the device into broader smart‑home workflows.
